about_the_game:
"


A Horde of New 5th Edition Monsters!

DM:

"A collection of hundreds of eyes floats down the corridor toward you, dripping caustic fluid that sizzles when it hits the ground. What do you do?"
PLAYER:

"I retire and become a farmer."

Whether you need dungeon vermin or world-shaking villains, the

Tome of Beasts 1
(2023 edition) has it. This product presents more than 400 foes suitable for any campaign setting--from tiny drakes and peculiar spiders to demon lords and ancient dragons.

Tome of Beasts 1
 introduces new foes and upgrades monsters that originally appeared in

Tome of Beasts
, including:
  • Full errata and streamlined mechanics to make monsters even more playable
  • 11 all-new creatures like the ashwalker, planewatcher, and the ancient cave dragon
  • Expanded tables by creature type and terrain
  • New monster art--and much more!
Give your players encounters they won't soon forget. Now easier to run than ever! 
"
